long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension works only on Ramat Gan municipality COVID19 dashboard on https://www.ramat-gan.muni.il/covid19/

This extension adds an element which clicking on it enables the users to view COVID19 active cases delta for each neighborhood, and active cases relatively to the neighborhood population, and not only active cases.

Without this extension, active cases delta are shown only for 10 out of 30 neighborhoods, on the tabular view, and not showing the cases relativity to the neighborhood population at all.
